title: Why should Miscellanous be at the top of Boards?
body: I feel Gameplay and strategy would be better, not halfway down the list where no one can find it

replies.body: Because it's GD's prodigy, and it deserves to be at the top.

Are people just looking for things to complain about? No wonder Riot employees don't post here. Too hard to filter through all the angsty teen posts. "OMG Riot i hate these baords, only because they are blue and my favourite color is orange!"
